name: galactic gabriel bot
description: I am Gabriel tech, a Simple WhatsApp Bot built with NodeJs to Enhance WhatsApp Communication experience

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session-id here. Must Start with 'Gifted~'

MODE.description: Set Mode  to 'public' to work in all chats only, 'inbox' to work in pm(inbox) chats only or 'private' to work for you only. Default is 'public'. You can set up this later using .mode private/inbox/group/public

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put only one Owner Number Here ie 2547xxxxx

SUDO_NUMBERS.description: Put Sudo Numbers separated by comma Here ie 2547xxxx,2557xxxxx,928xxxxx. Sudos have same rights as owner(can command the bot)

CHAT_BOT.description: Put value to 'true' to enablle for all chats or 'inbox' to ebanle in pm(inbox) chats only or 'groups' to enable in groups only else false. You can set up this later using .chatbot on/inbox/groups/off

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to view statuses. You can set up this later using .autoview on/off

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to read and like statuses. You can set up this later using .autolike on/off

AUTO_LIKE_EMOJI.description: Input your custom status like emoji(any) else leave blank to use default => ðŸ’œ

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want the bot to send message after viewing status
